projects.name: Smart Gameboard for DnD
projects.shortDescription: A modular smart gameboard that digitally tracks physical piece movements and synchronizes them online, enabling local and remote players to participate in the same game.

projects.name: Unify
projects.shortDescription: A mobile app designed to improve communication between students and professors in large lectures, built with Kotlin and Firebase.
contributions: Other Functions as part of mobile Team

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.shortDescription: A personal portfolio project built as an Angular web app with a retro webcore design, project search, and tag filtering, hosted on an Azure VM with Apache.
contributions: Designed and implemented the layout and retro webcore aesthetic
Developed the projects module using a JSON data source
Built live search and tag-based filtering functionality
